title: Back To Central City
body:
Back To Central City

---) Current Number Of Saved Shadows: 500/4000

"Is it really because of this dammed bloodline?" Evan muttered, looking at his status window. "If it's really because of this Doom Bringer bloodline then I'm going to be in a lot of trouble because of this sh*t."

Earlier, Evan didn't think much about the 20% decrease in luck. But now that he carefully considered its effect on him, he found the situation was actually quite serious.

The most serious issue is the effect of this Bloodline on his skills.

Take his skill Shadow Nails for example.
